H3158.def: = inhabitant of town or valley of {L:Jezreel<SDBH:יִזְרְעֶאל>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H7122.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8111.def: = town; ◄ constructed by king {L:Omri<SDBH:עָמְרִי>}; ► capital of northern {L:Israelite<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} kingdom until it was conquered by {L:Assyrians<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}; ≈ often used metonymically to refer to the entire northern kingdom

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H5022.def: = man; ◄ {L:from Jezreel<SDBH:יִזְרְעֵאלִי>}; ► owner of vineyard; time of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7523.def: = causative action by which humans take the life of other humans, whether or not intentionally

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3952.def: = action by which humans or animals take up liquids with their tongue

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H5022.def: = man; ◄ {L:from Jezreel<SDBH:יִזְרְעֵאלִי>}; ► owner of vineyard; time of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H3282.def: = a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1197.def: = process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H8366.def: literally: person who urinates against the wall; hence: = male human; ≈ used exclusively in contexts where this person is the victim of aggression

H7023.def: = flat construction, ◄ normally made of stone, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6113.def: = action by which someone slows down or stops moving forward entirely

H5800.def: = action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3379.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Nebath<SDBH:נְבָט>}; ► former servant of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>} who later became the first king of the northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5028.def: = man; ► father of king {L:Jeroboam<SDBH:יָרָבְעָם>}, king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3707.def: = state/process by which humans or deities experience displeasure; ◄ caused by someone else's condition or behavior

H3708.def: = state in which human experience displeasure, which is said to reside in their {L:heart<SDBH:לֵב>} ◄ and is caused by their own condition or by someone else

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H348.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Ethbaal<SDBH:אֶתְבַּעַל>}, king of {L:Sidon<SDBH:צִידֹון>}; ► wife of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2426.def: meaning unsure; probably: = a structure surrounding a town, outside the main wall; ◄ made out of of stones or bricks; ► provides strength and security to the town; ≈ sometimes used metaphorically to denote someone who offers protection

H3157.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H348.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Ethbaal<SDBH:אֶתְבַּעַל>}, king of {L:Sidon<SDBH:צִידֹון>}; ► wife of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H1544.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ usually made from stone or wood overlaid with gold or silver; ► functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H7167.def: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H8242.def: = relatively large receptacle ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H6684.def: = action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3665.def: = action by which humans show a low estimate of their own importance, usually before a deity

H3282.def: = a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
